item.title: A software for modern statistical process monitoring
item.description: I developed a Julia package for real-time statistical process monitoring, integrating advanced algorithms and control charts to handle complex data types, such as sequential data, functional data, and structured observations. A paper that accompanies the package has been published in the Journal of Statistical Software.

item.title: Stochastic Optimization Tools
item.description: A collection of R and Julia implementations for stochastic optimization algorithms, including constrained optimization methods for industrial applications. Features efficient algorithms for control chart parameter tuning and real-time process optimization.

item.title: Mixed Data Monitoring Framework
item.description: Implementation of statistical monitoring methods for mixed-type data (continuous, ordinal, categorical). Includes sequential monitoring capabilities under serial correlation with applications to quality control and process monitoring.
